name: Sugar 'Splosion - Fall 2017 - 470
description:
The player navigates in a sugary, sweet world while attempting to complete levels in different parts of delicious planets. A momentum based game, the player has two actions - one action pulls them towards an object they’re facing (Grapple), whereas the other pushes them away from the direction they’re facing while destroying destructible objects in front of them (Push Off). Landing these moves in succession will build a combo increasing the potency of each, and using the same move more than once will break the combo, bringing the player back down to base potency/combo.  Players will be awarded points based off of destruction and completion time.

Credits:

Desiree Makowski

Tom Crammond

Josh Burgenger

Steven Vaccari
